Dashboard.name: Sakila Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Dashboard based on test data from the Sakila database in MySQL

Chart.name: Film Ratings
Chart.description: Total number of films by rating
Chart.query: SELECT f.rating, COUNT(*) FROM film f GROUP BY f.rating

Chart.name: Payments by Month
Chart.description: Total of payment amounts during different months of the year
Chart.label: Payment amount in USD

Chart.name: Most Popular Actors
Chart.description: Top 10 actors who have starred in the most films
Chart.label: Number of films
Chart.query: SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name), COUNT(*) FROM film_actor fa INNER JOIN actor a ON a.actor_id = fa.actor_id GROUP BY CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

Chart.name: Number of Actors vs. Film Length
Chart.description: Number of actors in films compared to the length of the films
Chart.label: Actors vs. Length
Chart.query: SELECT f.length, COUNT(*) FROM film f INNER JOIN film_actor fa ON fa.film_id = f.film_id GROUP BY f.length, f.film_id
